heroSection.heroSubtitle: I specialize in building robust cloud infrastructure and high-performance applications. From complex backends to seamless user experiences, I engineer software that grows with your business.

projects.description: A Circular Economy Logistics Platform focusing on sustainability and resource recovery. Built to optimize routes for material collection and track lifecycle metrics.
